roleset.name: co-host (as a tv show)

example.name: both args
example.text: The show will be co - anchored by Bernard Shaw and Catherine Crier , a 34 - year - old former Texas judge and campus beauty queen who has never held a job in television or journalism .

propbank.arg: by Bernard Shaw and Catherine Crier , a 34 - year - old former Texas judge and campus beauty queen who has never held a job in television or journalism

roleset.note: COANCHOR-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Newswire. No VNcls. (from coanchor.01-v)
